notes.note:
Further improvements to [re-enable web extensions][1] which had been disabled for users with a master password set ([Bug 1549249][2]). [**More support information**][3]


  [1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/addons/2019/05/04/update-regarding-add-ons-in-firefox/
  [2]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1549249
  [3]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/add-ons-disabled-or-fail-to-install-firefox#w_master-password

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 66.0.5 Release
